name: Fighting Shapes
description:
Description:

An ancient legend is told between four planets from a certain place in the universe: when the sun turns white and illuminates everything, a terrible demon angel will appear and be the end.

And to combat this threat, four brave warriors decide to venture across the planets and fight for the survival of all.

Are you prepared to face this challenge? So, choose your fighter and good luck!

Game Features:
  • 2 languages: Portuguese and English;
  • 5 different fighters (one secret);
  • Arcade and Versus modes;
  • Joystick and Keyboard controls;
  • Resolution 640x480.
Controls:

On menus:
* Arrow Keys to select * Enter/Start to choose

On select/fight screen:

Player 1
* AWSD to move, F and G to attack
* Joystick (gamepad)

Player 2
* Arrow Keys to move, M and N to attack
* Joystick (gamepad)
